item.title: CVE-2023-5913|2024-08-02T08:14:24.622Z -- opentext -- fortify%20scancentral%20dast
item.description: Incorrect Privilege Assignment vulnerability in opentext Fortify ScanCentral DAST. TheÂ vulnerability could be exploited to gain elevated privileges.This issue affects Fortify ScanCentral DAST versions 21.1, 21.2, 21.2.1, 22.1, 22.1.1, 22.2, 23.1.
